<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The fair value of each stock
	option granted is estimated on the date of grant using the Black-Scholes option pricing model. Expected volatilities are based
	on the historical volatility of Hallmark&rsquo;s and similar companies&rsquo; common stock for a period equal to the expected term.
	The risk-free interest rates for periods within the contractual term of the options are based on rates for U.S. Treasury Notes
	with maturity dates corresponding to the options&rsquo; expected lives on the dates of grant. Expected term is determined based
	on the simplified method as we do not have sufficient historical exercise data to provide a basis for estimating the expected term.
	There were no stock options granted in 2015, 2014 or 2013.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
<B>
<U>
	Restricted Stock
	Units:
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The 2005 LTIP was amended by
	the stockholders on May 30, 2013 to authorize the grant of restricted stock units, in addition to the other types of awards available
	thereunder. Restricted stock units awarded under the 2005 LTIP represent the right to receive shares of common stock upon the satisfaction
	of vesting requirements, performance criteria and other terms and conditions. On July 27, 2012 and April 10, 2013, an aggregate
	of 129,463 and 122,823 restricted stock units, respectively, were conditionally granted to certain of our employees subject to
	shareholder approval of the amendments to the 2005 LTIP at the May 30, 2013 shareholder meeting. One conditional grant of 9,280
	restricted stock units was forfeited prior to approval at the shareholder meeting. Subsequently on September 8, 2014, an aggregate
	of 175,983 restricted stock units were granted to certain employees. On May 29, 2015, an aggregate of 103,351 restricted stock
	units were granted to certain employees under the 2015 LTIP.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The performance criteria for
	all restricted stock units require that we achieve certain compound average annual growth rates in book value per share over the
	vesting period in order to receive shares of common stock in amounts ranging from 50% to 150% of the number of restricted stock
	units granted. In addition, certain restricted stock units contain an additional performance criteria related to the attainment
	of an average combined ratio percentage over the vesting period. Grantees of restricted stock units do not have any rights of a
	stockholder, and do not participate in any distributions to our common stockholders, until the award fully vests upon satisfaction
	of the vesting schedule, performance criteria and other conditions set forth in their award agreement. Therefore, unvested restricted
	stock units are not considered participating securities under ASC 260, &ldquo;Earnings Per Share,&rdquo; and are not included in
	the calculation of basic or diluted earnings per share.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	On April 1, 2015, 8,616 shares
	of common stock were issued with respect to 8,616 restricted stock units which were granted on July 27, 2012 and vested on March
	31, 2015. If and to the extent specified performance criteria have been achieved, the restricted stock units granted on April 10,
	2013 will vest on March 31, 2016, the restricted stock units granted on September 8, 2014 (except for one grant) will vest on March
	31, 2017, one grant of restricted stock units granted on September 8, 2014 will vest on March 31, 2018 and the restricted stock
	units granted on May 29, 2015 under the 2015 LTIP will vest on March 31, 2018.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Compensation cost is measured
	as an amount equal to the fair value of the restricted stock units on the date of grant and is expensed over the vesting period
	if achievement of the performance criteria is deemed probable, with the amount of the expense recognized based on our best estimate
	of the ultimate achievement level. The grant date fair value of the restricted stock units granted in 2012 and 2013 is $9.20 per
	unit. The grant date fair value of the restricted stock units granted in 2014 is $9.66 per unit. The grant date fair value of the
	restricted stock units granted in 2015 is $11.10 per unit. We incurred compensation expense of $226 thousand, $49 thousand and
	$145 thousand related to restricted stock units during the year ended December 31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, respectively. We recorded
	an income tax benefit of $79 thousand, $17 thousand and $51 thousand related to restricted stock units during the year ended December
	31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	F-

	and 2015 LTIP, of which $0.4 million is expected to be recognized in 2016, $0.3 million is expected to be recognized in 2017 and
	$0.1 million is expected to be recognized in 2018.

<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Certain employees of the Standard
	Commercial Segment were participants in a defined cash balance plan covering all full-time employees who had completed at least
	1,000 hours of service. This plan was frozen in March 2001 in anticipation of distribution of plan assets to members upon plan
	termination. All participants were vested when the plan was frozen.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	Years ended December 31, 2015, 2014,
	and 2013
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	As of December 31, 2015, the
	fair value of the plan assets was composed of cash and cash equivalents of $0.3 million, debt securities of $3.4 million and equity
	securities of $6.7 million.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Our investment objectives are
	to preserve capital and to achieve long-term growth through a favorable rate of return equal to or greater than 5% over the long-term
	(60 year) average inflation rate as measured by the consumer price index. The objective of the equity portion of the portfolio
	is to achieve a return in excess of the Standard &amp; Poor&rsquo;s 500 index. The objective of the fixed income portion of the
	portfolio is to add stability, consistency, safety and total return to the total fund portfolio.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	We prohibit investments in options,
	futures, precious metals, short sales and purchase on margin. We also restrict the investment in fixed income securities to &ldquo;A&rdquo;
	rated or better by Moody&rsquo;s or Standard &amp; Poor&rsquo;s rating services and restrict investments in common stocks to only
	those that are listed and actively traded on one or more of the major United States stock exchanges, including NASDAQ. We manage
	to an asset allocation of 45% to 75% in equity securities. An investment in any single stock issue is restricted to 5% of the total
	portfolio value and 90% of the securities held in mutual or commingled funds must meet the criteria for common stocks.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To develop the expected long-term
	rate of return on assets assumption, we consider the historical returns and the future expectations for returns for each asset
	class, as well as the target asset allocation of the pension portfolio. This resulted in the selection of the 6.5% long-term rate
	of return on assets assumption. The expected return on plan assets uses the fair market value as of December 31, 2015. To develop
	the discount rate used in determining the benefit obligation we used the Wells Fargo AA Pension Discount Curve at the measurement
	date to match the timing and amounts of projected future benefits. A corridor approach is used to amortize actuarial gains and
	losses. We are applying the 10% threshold set forth in ASC 715. In addition, since all accrued benefits under the plan are frozen,
	we are amortizing the unrecognized gains and losses outside of the corridor by the average life expectancy of the plan participants.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	We are not required to make
	a contribution to the defined benefit cash balance plan during 2016. We expect our 2016 periodic pension cost to be $(21) thousand,
	the components of which are interest cost of $512 thousand, expected return on plan assets of ($645) thousand and amortization
	of actuarial loss of $112 thousand.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The following table shows the
	weighted-average asset allocation for the defined benefit cash balance plan held as of December 31, 2015 and 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;

	Effective January 1, 2008, we
	determine the fair value of our financial instruments based on the fair value hierarchy established in ASC 820. (See Note 3.)
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Our plan assets also include
	cash and cash equivalents of $0.3 million and $0.4 million at December 31, 2015 and 2014, respectively, and are carried at cost
	which approximates fair value.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75PT">
	We sponsor two defined contribution
	plans. Under these plans, employees may contribute a portion of their compensation on a tax- deferred basis, and we may contribute
	a discretionary amount each year. We contributed $0.3 million for each of the years ended December 31, 2015, 2014 and 2013.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	We concluded that no valuation allowance was necessary
	to provide against our deferred tax assets as of December 31, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	on the statutory tax rate to the provision reflected in the consolidated financial statements for the years ended December 31,
	2015, 2014 and 2013, is as follows (in thousands):

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	We have available, for federal
	income tax purposes, unused net operating loss of $1.2 million at December 31, 2015. The losses were acquired as part of the HIC
	and HCM acquisitions and may be used to offset future taxable income. Utilization of the losses is limited under Internal Revenue
	Code Section 382. The Internal Revenue Code provides that effective with tax years beginning September 1997, the carry-back and
	carry-forward periods are 2 years and 20 years, respectively, with respect to newly generated operating losses. The net operating
	losses will expire if unused, as follows (in thousands):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	Years ended December 31, 2015, 2014,
	and 2013
</U>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	We have several leases, primarily for office facilities
	and computer equipment, which expire in various years through 2022. Certain of these leases contain renewal options. Rental expense
	amounted to $2.2 million, $2.3 million and $2.2 million for the years ended December 31, 2015, 2014, and 2013, respectively.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN">
	Future minimum lease payments under non-cancelable
	operating leases as of December 31, 2015 are as follows (in thousands):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 32.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	From time to time, assessments
	are levied on us by the guaranty association of the states where we offer our insurance products. Such assessments are made primarily
	to cover the losses of policyholders of insolvent or rehabilitated insurers. Since these assessments can generally be recovered
	through a reduction in future premium taxes paid, we capitalize the assessments that can be recovered as they are paid and amortize
	the capitalized balance against our premium tax expense. We did not receive an assessment during 2015 or 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	During the third quarter of
	2015 we paid $1.2 million in fulfillment of the contingent purchase price with the sellers of TBIC Holding. The sellers have disputed
	the calculation of the amount paid and assert that an additional $1.8 million is due. We disagree with this assertion and believe
	that our calculation of the contingent purchase price was substantially correct. Pursuant to the terms of the acquisition agreement,
	an independent actuary has been engaged to resolve this matter.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT -0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In November 2015, HSU was informed
	by the Texas Comptroller of Public Accounts that a surplus lines tax audit covering the period January 1, 2010 through December
	31, 2013 was complete. HSU frequently acts as a managing general underwriter (&ldquo;MGU&rdquo;) authorized to underwrite policies
	on behalf of Republic Vanguard Insurance Company and HSIC, both Texas eligible surplus lines insurance carriers. In its role as
	the MGU, HSU underwrites policies on behalf of these carriers while other agencies located in Texas (generally referred to as &ldquo;producing
	agents&rdquo;) deliver the policies to the insureds and collect all premiums due from the insureds. During the period under audit,
	the producing agents also collected the surplus lines premium taxes due on the policies from the insureds, held them in trust,
	and timely remitted those taxes to the Comptroller. We believe this system for collecting and paying the required surplus lines
	premium taxes complies in all respects with the Texas Insurance Code and other regulations, which clearly require that the same
	party who delivers the policies and collects the premiums will also collect premium taxes, hold premium taxes in trust, and pay
	premium taxes to the Comptroller. It also complies with long standing industry practice. In addition, effective January 1, 2012
	the Texas Legislators enacted House Bill 3410 (HB3410) which allows an MGU to contractually pass the collection, payment and administration
	of surplus lines taxes down to another Texas licensed surplus line agent.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Comptroller asserts that
	HSU is liable for the surplus lines premium taxes related to policy transactions and premiums collected from surplus lines insureds
	during January 1, 2010 through December 31, 2011, the period prior to the passage of HB3410, and that HSU therefore owes $2.5 million
	in premium taxes, as well as $0.7 million in penalties and interest for the audit period.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT -0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	We disagree with the Comptroller
	and intend to vigorously fight their assertion that HSU is liable for the surplus lines premium taxes. We are currently in negotiations
	with the Comptroller to settle the matter. However, we are presently unable to reasonably estimate the possible loss or legal costs
	that are likely to arise out of the surplus lines tax audit or any future proceedings relating to this matter. Therefore we have
	not accrued any amount as of December 31, 2015 related to this matter.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	We are engaged in legal proceedings
	in the ordinary course of business, none of which, either individually or in the aggregate, are believed likely to have a material
	adverse effect on our consolidated financial position or results of operations, in the opinion of management. The various legal
	proceedings to which we are a party are routine in nature and incidental to our business.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 32.1PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<U>
	Years ended December 31, 2015, 2014,
	and 2013

	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
	18.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<B>
<U>
	Concentrations of
	Credit Risk
</U>
</B>
	:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	We maintain cash and cash equivalents
	in accounts with four financial institutions in excess of the amount insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation. We monitor
	the financial stability of the depository institutions regularly and do not believe excessive risk of depository institution failure
	existed at December 31, 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	We are also subject to credit
	risk with respect to reinsurers to whom we have ceded underwriting risk. Although a reinsurer is liable for losses to the extent
	of the coverage it assumes, we remain obligated to our policyholders in the event that the reinsurers do not meet their obligations
	under the reinsurance agreements. In order to mitigate credit risk to reinsurance companies, we monitor the financial condition
	of reinsurers on an ongoing basis and review our reinsurance arrangements periodically. Most of our reinsurance recoverable balances
	as of December 31, 2015 were with reinsurers that had an A.M. Best rating of &ldquo;A-&rdquo; or better. We also mitigate our credit
	risk for the remaining reinsurance recoverable by obtaining letters of credit.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Following is a summary of the
	unaudited interim results of operations for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2014 (in thousands, except per share data). In
	the opinion of management, all adjustments necessary to present fairly the results of operations for such periods have been made.
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.23
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 64.2PT; COLOR: #181818; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0; MARGIN-LEFT: 0IN; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/10/0001144204-16-087223_TLOGO.JPG" ALT="">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 64.2PT; COLOR: #181818; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 64.2PT; COLOR: #181818; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; COLOR: #181818">
<U>
	CONFIDENTIALITY
	AND NON-SOLICITATION AGREEMENT
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.9PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Confidentiality and Non-Solicitation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	(the
	&quot;Agreement&quot;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	is made between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Hallmark
</FONT>
	Financial
	Services, Inc. (&ldquo;Hallmark&rdquo;), and
<B>
	______
</B>
	(the &quot;Employee&quot;) (collectively, the &quot;Parties&quot;).
	This Agreement is ancillary to and in consideration of the grant of Restricted Stock Units evidenced by the Restricted Stock Unit
	Award Agreement dated May 29, 2015 (&ldquo;RSU Agreement&rdquo;).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; COLOR: #181818">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.9PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	In
	consideration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of (i) Employee's employment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	by Hallmark
	Financial Services, Inc.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	or by one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	affiliates (collectively
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	&quot;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Hallmark&quot;)
	in a capacity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	high
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	trust
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	confidence in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	which Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	may
	develop
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	receive highly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	sensitive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	restricted and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	proprietary information involving
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Confidential
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Information
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	(as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	defined
	below), and in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	which Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	seek
	out
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	and develop customer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Goodwill (as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	defined
	below) using the resources provided by Hallmark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	as well
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	as
	Hallmark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	reputation,
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	(ii) the restricted stock units awarded under the RSU Agreement as permitted under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	the
	Hallmark Financial Services, Inc. 2015 Long Term Incentive Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	the
	receipt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	and sufficiency of which are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	hereby acknowledged,
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	hereby
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	agrees
	as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 33.9PT; COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.25PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35.65PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Employment
	At Will.
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	The Employee agrees that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	she
	is an &quot;at will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	&quot;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
	Hallmark and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	that he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	she
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	may terminate his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	her
	employment at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	time. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	further
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	agrees that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Hallmark
	may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	similarly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	terminate the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Employee's
	employment at any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	time.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	agreement
	does not create
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	a contract
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	employment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	for any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	specified
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	duration,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	either expres
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	ly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	by implication.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 5.9PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.9PT; COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 5.9PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.9PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
<B>
<U>
	Non-disclosure
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Confidential
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Information
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Employee acknowledges
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	that, in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	order
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	him
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	her to perform
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	her duties properly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	have
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	access
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Hallmark
	must neces
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	arily entrust
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	him
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	her
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	certain proprietary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	and
	confidential
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	business information
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	(the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	&quot;Confidential
	Information&quot;).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	The Employee agrees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	during the term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	his
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #505050">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	her
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	employment with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Hallmark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	and
	at all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	times thereafter, regardless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	the
	reason
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	employment
</FONT>

	,

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	he
</FONT>

	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	she
	will

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	any Hallmark Confidential

	Information

	or induce, any employee, consultant, or independent contractor of Hallmark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	employed
	or engaged by Hallmark during the twenty- four (24) month period prior to the date of Employee&rsquo;s termination, to terminate
	his/her/its relationship with Hallmark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	for any reason whatsoever, without the prior approval
	of the company.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	Employee agrees not to directly or indirectly on behalf of or for the benefit
	of a third party solicit for employment, offer employment to, engage the services of or knowingly interfere with the employment
	of any officers, directors, or employees of Hallmark or its subsidiaries or affiliates. However, nothing contained in this paragraph
	shall prohibit a terminated employee from utilizing services performed by a vendor or consultant merely because such vendor or
	consultant also provides services to Hallmark or its subsidiaries or affiliates or prohibit the hiring of any Hallmark employee
	who responds to a general advertisement/employment solicitation made by the terminated employee or his/her then current employer
	addressed to the public at large and not expressly or impliedly directed to employees of Hallmark, its subsidiaries or affiliates.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: #151515">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Prohibited
	solicitation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	under thi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #3D3D3D">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	include
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #3D3D3D">
	s but is not limited to:
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
<B>
<U>
	Waivers.
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	waiver by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Hallmark
	or

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT; COLOR: #181818">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	6.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
<B>
<U>
	Survival,
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Binding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Effect.
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	The provisions of this Agreement shall survive the termination of the Employee&rsquo;s
	employment relationship with Hallmark and/or the assignment of this Agreement by Hallmark to any successor in interest or other
	assignee, provided however, that in the event that Employee&rsquo;s employment is terminated by Hallmark without cause, Section
	3.
<B>
<U>
	Prohibited Post-employment Solicitation
</U>
</B>
	, shall not survive.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT; COLOR: #181818">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	7.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
<B>
<U>
	Without
	Cause
</U>
</B>
<U>
<B>
	Termination of Employment by Hallmark:
</B>
</U>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	In
	the event of Employee&rsquo;s termination from employment by Hallmark without cause Employee will be offered a Severance Agreement
	and General Release containing terms and conditions under which Employee would be eligible to receive a severance package, with
	a minimum severance payment of six months of base salary.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT; COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	8.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Assignability
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	by Hallmark.
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	assignable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Hallmark
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	inures to the benefit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of Hallmark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	subsidiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #595959">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	affiliated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	corporations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	successors and assignees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #030303">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Agreement, being personal, is not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	assignable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	by
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Employee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35.25PT; COLOR: #181818">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 35.25PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	9.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Severability.
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	The covenants of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	are
	intended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	to be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	separable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	expressions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	used there in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	intended
	to refer to divi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	ible entities.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	According
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #030303">
	l
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	y,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	the invalidity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	part
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of any section
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	not
	render invalid the remainder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of this Agreement or of such section.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	If,
	in any judicial proceeding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	provision
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	found
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	to be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	so
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	broad
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	to be unenforceable,
	it
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	hereby
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	agreed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	such provision shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	be
	interpreted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	be only so
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	broad
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	to be enforceable.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.9PT; COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.7PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.9PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	10.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
<B>
<U>
	Governing
	Law.
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	This Agreement shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	governed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	interpreted
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	accordance with the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	laws
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
	the State of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Texas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	governing a contract
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	made
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	and wholly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	performed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	within
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	State of Texas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN; COLOR: #181818">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	11.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
<B>
<U>
	Consent
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	To Jurisdiction.
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #151515">
	The
	parties will consent to and will submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the federal and state courts sitting in Fort Worth, Tarrant
	County, Texas for all purposes relating to the validity, interpretation or enforcement of this Agreement, including, without limitation,
	any application for injunctive relief.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.05PT; COLOR: #181818; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 7.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	12.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
<B>
<U>
	Covenant
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Not To
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Sue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Outside
	Of Texas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	.
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	hereby
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	that
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	she will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	neither
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	commence or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	prosecute, nor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	assist
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	in any way another person
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	entity
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	commence or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	prosecute
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #595959">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	legal action
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	or
	other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	proceeding (including but not limited to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	declaratory
	judgment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	action) against
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Hallmark concerning
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	dispute
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	arising from or relating
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	to
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	forum
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	jurisdiction
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	than the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	state
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	and federal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	courts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	in
	the State
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of Texas. Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	further
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	agrees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #707070">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	/
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	she
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	disregards
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	clause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #494949">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	Hallmark
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	entitled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	to
	recover its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	reasonable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	attorneys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #595959">
	'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	fees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	and other costs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	incurred
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	staying,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	transferring, dismissing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	or
	otherwise
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	defending
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	such out-of-state
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	action
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	proceeding, regardless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	whether
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	such fees and costs are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	incurred
	in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	forum where Employee commenced the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	action
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Texas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	forum,
	and without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	regard
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	to whether Hallmark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	prevails
	in its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	efforts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	enforce
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	covenant.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 6.25PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 34.25PT">
	13.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
<B>
<U>
	Entire
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Agreement, Amendments.
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	constitutes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	entire
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	understanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	the parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	respect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	subject
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	matter,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	supersedes any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	prior communication
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	understanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	respect
	thereto,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	no modification or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	waiver
	of any provision
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	hereof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	valid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	unless made in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	writing
	and signed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #2B2B2B">
	all of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #181818">
	the
	parties hereto.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 8.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 31.9PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	14.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
<U>
	Return
	of Hallmark Property
</U>
</B>
</FONT>
<B>
<U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	and Confidential
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Information
	Upon Termination of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Employment.
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Employee agrees,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	upon termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	his/her
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	employment for any reason, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	deliver
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	the following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Hallmark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	promptly and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	without waiting for a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	request
	from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Hallmark: all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	file
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	s,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	book
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	s,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	documents,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	computer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	disk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	tapes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	computers,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	phone
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	s,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	PDAs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #565656">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	keys, security
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	passe
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	s,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	credit cards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: DIMGRAY">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	any other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	property prepared by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	n behalf
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	of Hallmark
	or otherwise
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	provided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	for by Hallmark;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Confidential
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Information in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Employee's
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	possession,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	and any copies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	thereof.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Employee further agrees to refrain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	making,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	retaining or distributing copies of any such property or Confidential
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	Information.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	To
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	extent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	has
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	data
	belonging to Hallmark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	on any storage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	media
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	owned
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	therwise used by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Employee
	(for example, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	personal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	computer's
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hard
	disk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	drive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #565656">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	portable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	data
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	storage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	device,
	etc.)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	agrees
	that immediately upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	termination to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Hallmark
	with a copy of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the data
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	and then
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	permanently
	purge
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	such computer (or other storage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	media)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	the data
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	Employee
	agrees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	to provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	written or other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	po
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	itive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	confirmation of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	removal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	or
	return of such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	data from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	personal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	storage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	media upon Hallmark&rsquo;s written request for
	such confirmation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 8.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 31.9PT; COLOR: #161616">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 8.6PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 31.9PT">
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	15.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	This
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	may be
</FONT>

	executed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	in
	multiple
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	counterparts,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	of
	which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #414141">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #161616">
	hall be treated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #282828">
	as
	an original.
</FONT>
</P>

<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	o
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	TGA Special Risk, Inc.*
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="PADDING-LEFT: 45PT">
	Texas
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_SUBSIDIARIES>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	* Conducts business under its corporate name.
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage117"></A>
<A NAME="V429419_EX31A_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	Exhibit 31(a)
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	CERTIFICATIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	I, Naveen Anand, certify
	that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I
	have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Hallmark Financial Services, Inc.;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based
	on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary
	to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to
	the period covered by this report;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based
	on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material
	respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the Registrant as of, and for, the periods presented
	in this report;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Registrant&rsquo;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures
	[as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)] and internal control over financial reporting [as defined in Exchange
	Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)] for the Registrant and have:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;designed
	such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision,
	to ensure that material information relating to the Registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by
	others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;designed
	such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our
	supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial
	statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaluated
	the effectiveness of the Registrant&rsquo;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about
	the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation;
	and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;disclosed
	in this report any change in the Registrant&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the Registrant&rsquo;s
	most recent fiscal quarter (the Registrant&rsquo;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected,
	or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the Registrant&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Registrant&rsquo;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over
	financial reporting, to the Registrant&rsquo;s auditors and the audit committee of the Registrant&rsquo;s board of directors (or
	persons performing the equivalent functions):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all
	significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which
	are reasonably likely to adversely affect the Registrant&rsquo;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information;
	and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any
	fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the Registrant&rsquo;s
	internal control over financial reporting.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	Date:
</TD>
<TD>
	March 10, 2016
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	/s/ Naveen Anand
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Naveen Anand, Chief Executive Officer
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	CERTIFICATIONS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	I, Jeffrey R. Passmore,
	certify that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25IN">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I
	have reviewed this annual report on Form 10-K of Hallmark Financial Services, Inc.;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.5IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based
	on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary
	to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to
	the period covered by this report;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Based
	on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material
	respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the Registrant as of, and for, the periods presented
	in this report;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	4.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Registrant&rsquo;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures
	[as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)] and internal control over financial reporting [as defined in Exchange
	Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)] for the Registrant and have:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;designed
	such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision,
	to ensure that material information relating to the Registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by
	others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;designed
	such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our
	supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial
	statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evaluated
	the effectiveness of the Registrant&rsquo;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about
	the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation;
	and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;disclosed
	in this report any change in the Registrant&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the Registrant&rsquo;s
	most recent fiscal quarter (the Registrant&rsquo;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected,
	or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the Registrant&rsquo;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25IN">
	5.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
	Registrant&rsquo;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over
	financial reporting, to the Registrant&rsquo;s auditors and the audit committee of the Registrant&rsquo;s board of directors (or
	persons performing the equivalent functions):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all
	significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which
	are reasonably likely to adversely affect the Registrant&rsquo;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information;
	and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any
	fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the Registrant&rsquo;s
	internal control over financial reporting.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.5IN">
	Date:
</TD>
<TD>
	March 10, 2016
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 50%; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	/s/ Jeffrey R. Passmore
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

</FONT>

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. &sect;
	1350
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.75IN">
	I, Naveen Anand, Chief
	Executive Officer of Hallmark Financial Services, Inc. (the &quot;Company&quot;), hereby certify that the accompanying annual report
	on Form&nbsp;10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2015, and filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date
	hereof (the &quot;Report&quot;), fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange
	Act of 1934, as amended. I further certify that the information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects,
	the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;

	Chief Accounting Officer of Hallmark Financial Services, Inc. (the &quot;Company&quot;), hereby certify that the accompanying annual
	report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2015, and filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on
	the date hereof (the &quot;Report&quot;), fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities
	Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. I further certify that the information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material
	respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
